content: आदिश् {c6c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To point out, indicate, show; मार्गं आदिश् (<ab>oft.</ab> in dramas) lead the way; <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To order, direct, command; वेलोपलक्षणार्थमादिष्टोस्मि <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; पुनरप्यादिश तावदुत्थितः <ls>Ku. 4. 16</ls>; तेषामप्येतदादिशेत् <ls>Ms. 11. 193</ls>; आदिक्षदस्याभिगमं वनाय <ls>Bk. 3. 9</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">7. 28</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 54</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 65</ls>; to appoint; वसुमित्रं गोप्तारमादिश्य <ls>M. 5.</ls> {@--3@} To aim at; assign; आदिक्षत्सिंहासनं तस्य <ls>Bk. 3. 3</ls>; हरिवीराणामादिशद्दक्षिणां दिशं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--4@} To report, announce; teach, lay down, prescribe, instruct, advise; न चास्य व्रतमादिशेत् <ls>Ms. 4. 80</ls>; बुद्धिमादिश्य <ls>R. 12. 68.</ls> {@--5@} To specify, determine; <ls>Y. 2. 260.</ls> {@--6@} To foretell, predict; सा सिद्धेनादिष्टा <ls>Ratn. 4</ls>, <ls>Bṛ. S. 5. 96</ls>; आदिष्टः सुरासुरसंगरो भावी <ls>V. 5.</ls> {@--7@} To undertake, try; ब्रह्मास्त्रमादिश <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--8@} To provoke, challenge. {@--9@} To profess as one's own duty. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To indicate, show, point out, announce &c. (same as आदिश्).

आदिश् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Aim, design, intention. {@--2@} A project, proposition. {@--3@} A proposal, declaration. {@--4@} A region, quarter. {@--5@} A sacrifice offered to a particular deity.
